short_summary: Removal and disposal, diagnostic soil samples in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island
description: See Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for details
full_summary:
***

### Removal and Disposal of Diagnostic Soil Samples in Charlottetown

#### Tender Notice Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites qualified suppliers to submit their proposals for the removal and disposal of diagnostic soil samples in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island.

#### Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | CB-272-69990382 |
| Solicitation Number | 2023-01009 |
| Publication Date | 27 February 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | 13 March 2024, 17:00 (EST) |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Amendment Date | 13 March 2024 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 01 April 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 31 March 2025 |
| Tender Status | Expired |

**Tender Requirements**

The selected supplier will be responsible for removing and disposing of diagnostic soil samples in Charlottetown, in accordance with relevant environmental and health regulations.

**Procurement Method**

This tender is being issued on a non-competitive basis. Suppliers interested in participating must submit their proposals by the specified closing date.

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: 13 March 2024, 17:00 (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 01 April 2024

**Contract Details**

The contract is expected to be a public contract, with an expected term of 12 months.

**Supplier Information**

 Suppliers interested in participating may contact:

* Peter Vinh, CFIA
* Phone: (343) 573-4194
* Email: [peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca)
* Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K2G 5W6

**Additional Resources**

* Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) document can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33065/2023-01009-advance-contract-award-notice-%28acan.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33065/2023-01009-advance-contract-award-notice-%28acan.pdf)**
***

I'm ready to assist you with this. Let me know what is next.  I will be happy to format this according to your expectations.
